A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Only Sith deal in absolutes. Fans must reach out farther to fully experience Episode XIII: The Last Jedi. Last Jedi challenges viewers to reexamine Star Wars with an open mind and heart. Its characters\, new and old\, forge connections that tie together disparate pieces from across the previous trilogies. I look forward to the continued saga of Rey\, Finn\, Poe\, and Kylo in Episode IX.
